name: Broke Student Hustle
description:
You play as a student who just graduated with a college diploma. While congratulations are in order, the debt collectors have come to take back the money you owe from all those student loans. Even as you run from it, the debt will always follow you. It's a reflection of your success and a curse. Outrun your fate for as long as you can. 

Credits for Art and Sound Assets belong to Bensound and Adobe Stock
